00014 #ifndef ULIB_CACHE_H
00015 #define ULIB_CACHE_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/string.h>
00018 
00043 #define U_MAX_TTL         365L * U_ONE_DAY_IN_SECOND // 365 gg (1 anno)
00044 #define U_MAX_KEYLEN     1000U
00045 #define U_MAX_DATALEN 1000000U
00046 
00047 class U_EXPORT UCache {
00048 public:
00049 
00050         // Check for memory error
00051         U_MEMORY_TEST
00052 
00053         // Allocator e Deallocator
00054         U_MEMORY_ALLOCATOR
00055         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR
00056 
00057         // COSTRUTTORI
00058 
00059         UCache()
00060                 {
00061                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCache, "", 0)
00062                 }
00063 
00064         ~UCache()
00065                 {
00066                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UCache)
00067                 }
00068 
00069         // INIT
00070 
00071         void set(char* ptr)
00072                 {
00073                 U_TRACE(0, "UCache::set(%p)", ptr)
00074 
00075                 x    = ptr + sizeof(UCache::cache_info);
00076                 info = (cache_info*)ptr;
00077                 }
00078 
00079         void initStart()
00080                 {
00081                 U_TRACE(1, "UCache::initStart()")
00082 
00083                 (void) U_SYSCALL(gettimeofday, "%p,%p", &u_now, 0);
00084 
00085                 start = u_now.tv_sec;
00086                 }
00087 
00088         void init(uint32_t size);
00089 
00090         // OPEN/CREAT a cache file
00091 
00092    bool open(const UString& path, uint32_t size);
00093 
00094         // OPERATION
00095 
00096         void add(const UString& _key, const UString& _data, uint32_t ttl = 0)
00097                 {
00098                 U_TRACE(1, "UCache::add(%.*S,%.*S,%u)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_key), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(_data), ttl)
00099 
00100                 const char*  key =  _key.data();
00101                 const char* data = _data.data();
00102                 uint32_t keylen  =  _key.size(),
00103                                         datalen = _data.size();
00104 
00105                 char* ptr = add(key, keylen, datalen, ttl);
00106 
00107                 (void) U_SYSCALL(memcpy, "%p,%p,%u", ptr,           key,  keylen);
00108                 (void) U_SYSCALL(memcpy, "%p,%p,%u", ptr + keylen, data, datalen);
00109                 }
00110 
00111         // operator []
00112 
00113         UString operator[](const UString& key);
00114 
00115         // SERVICES
00116 
00117         UString    contentOf(const char* fmt, ...);
00118         UString  addContentOf(const UString& pathname);
00119         void      loadContentOf(const UString& directory);
00120 
00121         void reset() { (void) memset(x, 0, info->size); }
00122 
00123         uint32_t getTTL() const
00124                 {
00125                 U_TRACE(0, "UCache::getTTL()")
00126 
00127                 U_RETURN(ttl);
00128                 }
00129 
00130         uint32_t getTime() const
00131                 {
00132                 U_TRACE(1, "UCache::getTime()")
00133 
00134                 (void) U_SYSCALL(gettimeofday, "%p,%p", &u_now, 0);
00135 
00136                 uint32_t now = (uint32_t)(u_now.tv_sec - start);
00137 
00138                 U_RETURN(now);
00139                 }

00144         friend U_EXPORT ostream& operator<<(ostream& os, const UCache& c);

00149         const char* dump(bool reset) const;

00152 protected:
00153         typedef struct cache_info {
00154                 uint32_t size;    // size of cache
00155                 uint32_t hsize;   // size of hash table
00156                 uint32_t writer;  // pointer to free space
00157                 uint32_t oldest;  // pointer to oldest entries
00158                 uint32_t unused;  // pointer to unused space
00159                 } cache_info;
00160 
00161         typedef struct cache_hash_table_entry {
00162                 uint32_t link;
00163                 uint32_t keylen;
00164                 uint32_t datalen;
00165                 uint32_t        time_expire;
00166         // ------> keylen  array of char...
00167         // ------> datalen array of char...
00168         } cache_hash_table_entry;
00169 
00170         char* x;          // cache pointer
00171         cache_info* info; // cache info pointer
00172         time_t start;           // time of reference
00173         uint32_t ttl;     // time to live (scadenza entry)
00174 
00175         uint32_t getLink(uint32_t pos) const
00176                 {
00177                 U_TRACE(0, "UCache::getLink(%u)", pos)
00178 
00179                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(pos <= (info->size - sizeof(uint32_t)))
00180 
00181                 uint32_t value = u_get_unalignedp(x + pos);
00182 
00183                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("value = %u", value)
00184 
00185                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(value <= (info->size - sizeof(uint32_t)))
00186 
00187                 U_RETURN(value);
00188                 }
00189 
00190          cache_hash_table_entry* setHead(uint32_t pos, uint32_t value)
00191                 {
00192                 U_TRACE(0, "UCache::setHead(%u,%u)", pos, value)
00193 
00194                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MINOR(pos,info->hsize)
00195                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(value <= (info->size - sizeof(uint32_t)))
00196 
00197                 char* ptr = x + pos;
00198 
00199                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("ptr = %p *ptr = %u", ptr, u_get_unalignedp(ptr))
00200 
00201                 u_put_unalignedp(value, ptr);
00202 
00203                 ptr = x + value;
00204 
00205                 U_RETURN_POINTER(ptr, cache_hash_table_entry);
00206                 }
00207 
00208         cache_hash_table_entry* entry(uint32_t pos) const
00209                 {
00210                 U_TRACE(0, "UCache::entry(%u)", pos)
00211 
00212                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(pos <= (info->size - sizeof(uint32_t)))
00213 
00214                 cache_hash_table_entry* e = (cache_hash_table_entry*)(x + pos);
00215 
00216                 U_RETURN_POINTER(e, cache_hash_table_entry);
00217                 }
00218 
00219         void replace(uint32_t pos, uint32_t value)
00220                 {
00221                 U_TRACE(0, "UCache::replace(%u,%u)", pos, value)
00222 
00223                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(pos   <= (info->size - sizeof(uint32_t)))
00224                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT(value <= (info->size - sizeof(uint32_t)))
00225 
00226                 char* ptr = x + pos;
00227 
00228                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("*ptr = %u", u_get_unalignedp(ptr))
00229 
00230                 value ^= u_get_unalignedp(ptr);
00231 
00232                 u_put_unalignedp(value, ptr);
00233 
00234                 U_INTERNAL_DUMP("*ptr = %u", value)
00235                 }
00236 
00237         char* add(const char* key, uint32_t keylen, uint32_t datalen, uint32_t ttl);
00238 
00239         void print(ostream& os, uint32_t& pos) const;
00240 
00241 private:
00242         inline uint32_t hash(const char* key, uint32_t keylen) U_NO_EXPORT;
00243 
00244         UCache(const UCache&)            {}
00245         UCache& operator=(const UCache&) { return *this; }
00246 };
